attributes.action: Remove the "Marriage as exclusively only between one man and one woman" petition
attributes.background: The To define marriage as exclusively only between one man and one woman petition has been shared in face book and has kicked up a right stink. No one wants it and it's so late in the equality day for this nonsense to rear its head again. It's stupid, nonsense and inhuman.

rejection.details:
We can only remove petitions that don't comply with the petitions standards.

You could start a new petition calling for a specific change to the rules for petitions. You can find out about the rules here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/help
